name: Shard Jumper
description:
Sadly it seems like raycasting doesn't work in WebGL for me. So there will only be a standalone release. On a happier note: This is my first released game and my first game jam!

Shoot a panel to break it. When you jump to a shard it rewinds to its original position. Time speeds up when mouse is moved.  You can swap score for slower speed. Try to gain the highest score!

Panels come in red, yellow and green colors:

  • Red - Adds to score, makes time move faster. 
  • Yellow - Adds to score, makes time move slower.
  • Green - Adds to score, completes level.

Beware of the Eye.
